<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_snc_creatorcon_0.Train API call</api_name><description>Transform data resource that will call the Train API Flow</description><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Train API call</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    try {
        var inputs = {};
		inputs['train_stop'] = 1;
		
        var response = sn_fd.FlowAPI.startAction('x_snc_creatorcon_0.train_api_stops', inputs);
		return response;

    } catch (ex) {
        var message = ex.getMessage();
        gs.error(message);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-29 00:08:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>d128c01987e64110a34aecad3fbb3520</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Train API call</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train" source="x_snc_creatorcon_0">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_d128c01987e64110a34aecad3fbb3520</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-29 02:22:51</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d128c01987e64110a34aecad3fbb3520"/></record_update>
